com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.factory

Interface QueryFactory<T,U,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The domain query to return.
    U - The type that represents entity in the QueryFactoryRequest model.
    V - The type of the factory that will be used to build the query.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamoDBQueryFactory, HibernateQueryFactory

    public interface QueryFactory<T,U,V>
    A FactoryCallQueryFactory is a query factory that builds a domain query based upon supplied criteria.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T createGetAllQuery(QueryFactoryRequest<U,V> request)
      Create a query to get all records for a given entity.
      T createQuery(Query query, QueryFactoryRequest<U,V> request)
      Create the implementation query from the given jmortar query.

    • Method Detail

      • createGetAllQuery

        T createGetAllQuery(QueryFactoryRequest<U,V> request)
        Create a query to get all records for a given entity.
        Parameters:
        request - The request containing the parameters of the new query.
        Returns:
        The fully constructed domain query.

      • createQuery

        T createQuery(Query query,
              QueryFactoryRequest<U,V> request)
        Create the implementation query from the given jmortar query.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to build from.
        request - The request containing the parameters of the new query.
        Returns:
        The fully constructed domain query.
